name: Miranda BASHAM, A Minor, Troy Basham, A Minor by Douglas Basham, Guardian, Appellants, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D. Commissioner Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Miranda BASHAM, A Minor, Troy Basham, A Minor by Douglas Basham, Guardian, Appellants, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D. Commissioner Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2004, the above-captioned appeal is quashed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
853 A.2d 358
Miranda BASHAM, A Minor, Troy Basham, A Minor by Douglas Basham, Guardian, Appellants, v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D. Commissioner Department of Corrections, Appellee.
No. 74 WAP 2003.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 2004.
